str2: To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To flay, flog, scourge, beat. A primary verb; properly, to flay, i.e. to scourge, or to thrash.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To disgrace, treat disgracefully, dishonor, insult; I despise. From atimos; to render infamous, i.e. contemn or maltreat.
And he, she, it, and that. From kai and ekeinos; likewise that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From ek and apostello; to send away forth, i.e. to despatch, or to dismiss.
